text: was a Japanese LDP politician. He served as a local politician from 1951 to 1978 and in the House of Representatives from 1983 to 2003. He served as Minister of Home Affairs and Head of the National Public Safety Commission from 1994 to 1995, as Chief Cabinet Secretary from 1998 to 1999, and as Head of the Okinawa Development Agency in 1999. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile of Hiromu Nonaka Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Kyoto Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan
title: Hiromu Nonaka
